document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. Palaearctic (excluding North Africa) ( Barrios & Korotyaev 2013 )

Biology. Deciduous forests, shrublands, gardens. Adults occur in V–VII, IX. On
Ulmus campestris
,
U. elliptica
,
U. foliacea
( Ulmaceae ) ( Barrios 1986 )
